trans-unit.source: The event occurs whenever the user clicks on a button on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> control.
trans-unit.target: L'evento si verifica quando l'utente fa clic su un pulsante in un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs.Button%2A> property contains the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> wiith the information about the button that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs.Button%2A>proprietà contiene il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>con le informazioni relative al pulsante su cui è stato fatto clic.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs.Button%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs.Button%2A> property is set equal to the `button` parameter.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton"></xref> that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton"> </xref> che è stato selezionato.

trans-unit.source: The Button property is initially set equal to the `button` parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà del pulsante è inizialmente uguale al `button` parametro del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>costruttore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>
